ered how Vestige had been invigorated by his transfer of power from his che=
st core, where a beating heart still pulsates. It would prove useful again,=
 and this time, he needed a way to channel that power into the figure lying=

im. With the other arm, he reaches out to the figure's chest, and puts his =
hand on him gently. He concentrates deeply and tries to channel his own spi=
rituality into the figure lying on the bed. His very soul now acting upon h=
is heart out of the one power that no force could fight. The power of compa=
ssion, of love, and of loyalty.

othing that will stop me from bringing you back. My hand is here for you no=

ight optics lit up and
